#Text=Have Clothes Custom
#Text=Made in Hong Kong
#Text=Custom clothes have been a traditional souvenir of visiting China since Hong Kong belonged to China the first time .

#Text=If you have clothes custom made in Hong Kong , you ca n't expect the deeply discounted prices you 'll find on the mainland , but you can come home with an exquisite suit or dress made with fine fabrics and cut exactly to fit your form .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Create some preliminary ideas or sketches before you even leave your country of origin .
#Text=When getting clothes custom made in Hong Kong you should be prepared .
#Text=You 're very likely to spend much more than you budgeted for , and be less happy with the final result if you go without a plan or idea .
#Text=It can be a good idea to make your custom clothes part of your travel budget .
#Text=You 'll spend several hundred U.S. dollars on a quality Hong Kong tailor .
#Text=Talk to several tailors by phone or contact them via email to get an idea of their availability and prices .
#Text=The best tailors wo n't be available on a drop-in basis , so you can make an appointment as your travel plans are arranged .
#Text=You can find information about tailors in Hong Kong from recently-updated guidebooks for the city .
#Text=Another technique is to contact the hotel where you 'll be staying .
#Text=With tailored clothing being such a draw in Hong Kong tourism , the concierge is almost guaranteed to have a relationship with at least one tailor .
#Text=Visit the tailors you 're considering early during your stay in Hong Kong .
#Text=View fabric samples , talk about pricing and look at finished garments before committing to one tailor .
#Text=It 's best to set aside at least half a day for this research .
#Text=Set aside another half day for your fitting and initial negotiation with your tailor .
#Text=Bring sketches or photos from fashion magazines to help communicate exactly the kind of garment you want .
#Text=If you have a favorite suit , dress or other set of clothing , you can bring it to the tailor , and he will produce additional copies in different fabrics and colors .
#Text=Expect to pay a 50 percent deposit before your tailor will begin work .
#Text=Prior to paying that deposit , get a written agreement on price and due date .
#Text=Quality tailoring takes from several days to 1 week , so it 's best to get to this stage early during your vacation in Hong Kong .
#Text=Pick up your garment on the due date .
#Text=Check quality before you pay , and negotiate for any needed alterations .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Avoid tailors who offer package deals .
#Text=The best tailors will make your clothing exactly to order , without adding extra garments .
#Text=Establishments with those package deals work to templates , trusting the fact that the tourist market does n't represent many return customers .
#Text=Burlington Arcade on Nathan Road is famous for its wide selection of quality and reasonably-priced tailors .
